title: Website Portfolio
description: A responsive website that presents personal information, skills, projects, and contact details in a clean and professional layout.

title: RESTful API for To-Do Application
description: A backend service that provides RESTful APIs to manage tasks, including creating, updating, deleting, and retrieving to-do items.

title: User Authentication System
description: A backend system that handles user registration, login, password hashing, and authentication using JSON Web Tokens (JWT).
